name: Dominance of Earth
title: Zhongli: Dominance of Earth
desc: The vastness of rivers flows endless, perpetual upon the tapestry of eons.
inPlayDescription: When your active character is protected by a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Shield Character Status or a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Shield Combat Status, your Summons deal +1 <span style="color:#FFE699FF">Geo DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Zhongli to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Zhongli, equip this card.After Zhongli equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Dominus Lapidis: Striking Stone once.When your active character is protected by a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Shield Character Status or a <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Shield Combat Status, your Summons deal +1 <span style="color:#FFE699FF">Geo DMG.(You must have Zhongli in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
